Specimen Type: Whole blood, buccal swab, or dried blood spot
Purpose: To extract DNA, sequence target genes, and analyze variants for the diagnosis of lysosomal storage disorders.
Container: EDTA tube (for whole blood); buccal swab or filter paper card for dried blood spots
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, Qubit Fluorometer, Illumina MiSeq (NGS platform), thermal cycler, bioinformatics workstation/software
